tool_description: Standardizes and classifies demographic data into consistent categories across different census sources and survey years.

classification_schema.description: Target classification schema: standard_census, simplified, custom

target_categories.description: Specific categories to map data into

include_confidence_scores.description: Include classification confidence scores in output

handle_missing_categories.description: How to handle unmappable categories: ignore, other, error

error_messages: Empty demographic data: raw_demographic_data array cannot be empty
Invalid classification schema: Use one of [standard_census, simplified, custom]
Custom schema missing targets: target_categories required when using custom classification schema
Invalid missing category handling: Use one of [ignore, other, error]
Classification mapping failed: Unable to map some demographic categories to target schema
usage: Provide raw_demographic_data and specify classification_schema. For custom schemas, include target_categories. Configure how to handle unmappable categories.

classified_categories.description: Demographic data mapped to target categories

category_counts.description: Count of records in each target category

unmapped_items.description: Number of items that could not be classified

classification_summary.description: Summary of the classification process and results
